title: Vice President Joe Biden to Deliver Spring 2009 Commencement Addresses | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 17, 2009

 



Vice President Joe Biden to Deliver Spring 2009 Commencement Addresses




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President  _______________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                  April 17, 2009 Vice President Joe Biden to Deliver Spring 2009 Commencement Addresses  Vice President Joe Biden will serve as commencement speaker at Syracuse University, Wake Forest University, and the United States Air Force Academy this year. Vice President Biden will address graduates, family members, and faculty at Syracuse University on Sunday, May 10, 2009, Wake Forest University on Monday, May 18, 2009, and the United States Air Force Academy on Wednesday, May 27, 2009. More details will be announced at a later date.
